title: Redact a Document for Production
description: During discovery, an attorney needs to redact privileged information from a document before producing it to the other side.

tasks.description: Open the document in a redaction tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the document loaded in the appropriate software.

tasks.description: Identify all instances of attorney-client communication or attorney work product within the document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the specific text to be redacted.

tasks.description: Apply black-box redactions over the privileged text.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully covers the sensitive information.

tasks.description: Produce a new version of the document with the redactions permanently applied.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe, redacted version of the document is created for production.
